Name: AWS - Register ELB Instance
Description: Registers an instance with an ELB
Author: DudeSolutions

Parameters.Name: ec2ClientId
Parameters.Label: AWS EC2 Client Id
Parameters.HelpText: The client id to use when authenticating with AWS

Parameters.Name: ec2Credentials
Parameters.Label: AWS EC2 Client Secret
Parameters.HelpText: The client secret used to authenticate with AWS

Parameters.Name: elbName
Parameters.Label: AWS ELB Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the AWS ELB to add the instance to

Parameters.Name: registrationCheckInterval
Parameters.Label: Registration Check Interval
Parameters.HelpText: The number of seconds to wait before checking to see if the Instance has properly registered with the ELB

Parameters.Name: maxRegistrationCheckCount
Parameters.Label: Maximum Registration Checks
Parameters.HelpText: The maximum number of registration checks to perform before the step fails.

Parameters.Name: ec2Region
Parameters.Label: AWS EC2 Region
Parameters.HelpText: The region in which the ELB lives
